story.title: My Story
story.intro: Loewentouristik was founded in 2006 by graduate business administrator Agnes Kah.
story.paragraph1: Growing up in Cameroon, with extensive tourism experience in other African countries and studies and degrees in Europe – I have all the qualifications and experience to harmoniously connect the European and African worlds, offering you unforgettable travel experiences.
story.paragraph2: After studying Anthropology and Sociology at the University of Douala, I continued my studies as a scholarship holder in Germany. To utilize and further expand my experiences gained in the French-English speaking area and German cultural and educational space, I enrolled at the International School of Management.
story.paragraph3: With my degree in Tourism and Hotel Management and a diploma thesis on Cameroon's tourism sector, I combine academic knowledge with practical experience. This elite education included extensive studies, internships, and event management in Hawaii, Paris, London, the Florida Keys, Miami, Frankfurt/Main, Tyrol, and Bavaria.
